full_summary:
# Transmitter Pressure Goods and Services - Request for Proposal [W8482-241979/A]

## Overview

The Department of National Defence invites sealed bids from qualified suppliers to procure TRANSMITTER, PRESSURE products as described below. The bid opportunity will close on 2023-10-03T14:00:00.

## Bid Opportunity Details

* **Bid Reference Number**: cb-8370-68129128
* **Bid Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-241979/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-08-23
* **Bid Closing Date/Time**: 2023-10-03T14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-10-03
* **Country of Delivery**: Nova Scotia, Canada, British Columbia

## Goods and Services

The solicitation seeks the following goods and services:

* **Article 1: GSIN 6620**, TRANSMITTER, PRESSURE (Part No.: 2600BGG200JC3UA-KIT, NCAGE: 04034) for delivery to CFB Esquimalt
* **Article 2: GSIN 6620**, TRANSMITTER, PRESSURE (Part No.: 2600BGG200JC3UA-KIT, NCAGE: 04034) for delivery to CFB Halifax

## Submission Requirements

Bid submissions must be made in accordance with the procurement documents available on the Canadabuys website.

## Evaluation Criteria

The Crown intends to award the contract based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Special Conditions

* Canadian Content: The contract will be subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA).
* Currency: Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.

## Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority**:
	+ Name: Jean-Pierre Normandin
	+ Email: [Jean-Pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-Pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (819) 939-3674

## Notice Documentation

Relevant documents may be downloaded from the Canadabuys website, including:

* **bid Notice**: EN
* **bid Notice**: FR

Note to the Editor: Please review the notice to ensure all languages are included in the documentation.

You are expected to format the output in nice markdown and only include letters A-Z, numbers 0-9, space characters
